stories.title: The Death of Corporate Research Labs

stories.text: There are no shortage of frustrations with the business practices and illegal activity Ticketmaster utilizes to keep its dominance in the event ticketing space. I'm consistently baffled at how they remain so dominant, but I have little experience in this space. How would you go about displacing them?
stories.title: Ask HN: How would you displace Ticketmaster?

Efficacy of Ivermectin on Disease Progression Among Adults with Covid-19

stories.text:
TLDR: What timezone should I use for an alpha launch on Tuesday?

Hi Everyone, Call me superstitious but this coming Tuesday is just too good to pass up for an origin story. But, what timezone should it be? As a dev from the valley(x-LinkedIn) and a Californian (by heart, grew up in Ethiopia) I am thinking PT, but I am currently sitting at my apartment at Harvard Business School so I kind of feel like a poser. Thoughts? and WWYD? If you are launching as well, feel free to drop a line and we can pull all nighters together over discord @Yonz#3679.

Shameless plug: First 1000 people here will get beta access and lifelong FREE access https://allspark.substack.com/

What is it? See if you can figure it out with the scavenger hint: We will 'Innov8'!
stories.title: Ask HN: What Timezone for Launch 2:22PM on 02.22.2022?
